methods.javadoc: Returns true if this service's popup window is currently visible
methods.name: isShowing
methods.comment: Returns true if this service's popup window is currently visible

methods.javadoc: Hide this service's popup window if visible
methods.name: closeHover
methods.comment: Hide this service's popup window if visible

methods.name: mouseHovered
methods.comment:
Notify this service that the mouse is hovering over a specific field within a 
 field viewer.

params.name: fieldLocation
params.comment: the precise mouse location within the field viewer

params.name: field
params.comment: the field over which the mouse is hovering

params.name: fieldBounds
params.comment: the rectangle containing the bounds of the given field.

params.name: event
params.comment: the last mouse motion event over the field viewer component (i.e., FieldPanel).

return.comment: true if a popup window has been displayed adjacent to the mouse location.

methods.name: scroll
methods.comment:
If this service's window supports scrolling, scroll by the specified amount.  The value
 will be negative when scrolling should move up.

params.name: amount
params.comment: the amount by which to scroll
